dc:description: Fragment of brown woven wool fabric with a divided weft band, 1.1 cm wide). 1.5 cm from an edge.  There are 22 picks of purple wool in one half and 19 picks in the other half.  The two halves are divided by 2 picks of linen.  There is a brown stitch across part of the weft band.
